description.english: You survived the unsuccessful summoning ritual
You declined to join the Order
You accepted the invitation to join the Order
description.russian: Вы приняли приглашение вступить в Орден

description.english: You found the entries you needed in the Order’s archive
description.russian: Вы нашли нужные записи в архитве Ордена

description.english: You defeated the Order’s archive keeper
You found the keeper’s phylactery on the first attempt
description.russian: Вы нашли филактерию хранителя с первой попытки

description.english: You spotted all the items in Jeremy’s bedroom
description.russian: Вы осмотрели все предметы в спальне Джереми

description.english: You overheard a conversation in the library
You did not overhear a conversation in the library
description.russian: Вы не подслушали разговор в библиотеке

displayName.english: With the eyes of a demon

description.english: You spotted, with the help of demon eyes, everybody in the room
description.russian: Вы осмотрели с помощью глаз демона всех, присутствующих в комнате

description.english: You asked Jennifer uncomfortable questions
You made amends with Harry
You determined the location of the killer using the pendulum
description.russian: Вы определили местонахождение убийцы с помощью маятника

description.english: You didn’t make a single mistake during the battle with the killer
description.russian: Вы не допустили ни одной ошибки во время боя с убийцей

description.english: You didn’t let Vi seize control
description.russian: Вы не дали Ви перехватить контроль

description.english: You let Vi seize control
You refused your colleagues’ help
You conducted a secret conversation with Carlos
description.russian: Вы провели тайную беседу с Карлосом

description.english: You lured Harry to your side
description.russian: Вы переманили Гарри на свою сторону

description.english: You lured Jennifer to your side
description.russian: Вы переманили Дженнифер на свою сторону

description.english: You decided to go it alone
Your nerves have withstood the test of toughness
description.russian: Ваши нервы выдержали испытание на прочность

description.english: You unlocked all the achievements of Chapter I
description.russian: Вы получили все достижения первой главы

description.english: You found your new home
The shadows showed you the way
One less secret...
You made an agreement with Harry
You pressured Harry
You pressured Jennifer
You made an agreement with Jennifer
You agreed to take part in the ritual
description.russian: Вы согласились на участие в ритуале

description.english: You declined to take part in the ritual
description.russian: Вы отказались от участия в ритуале

description.english: You prepared the elixir without making any mistakes
description.russian: Вы приготовили эликсир, ни разу не ошибившись

description.english: Welcome to the ovium
You were victorious in your own ovium on your first try
description.russian: Вы одержали победу в своём овиуме с первого раза

description.english: You returned that which rightfully belongs to you
description.russian: Вы вернули то, что принадлежит вам по праву

description.english: We are all capable of succumbing to passion
Who is he, and who are you?
There are sins that simply cannot be forgiven
description.russian: Есть грехи, которые просто невозможно простить

displayName.english: In the maw of the dragon

description.english: You entered where it would never be expected
description.russian: Вы вошли туда, где никогда не ожидали оказаться

description.english: You were victorious in another’s ovium on your first try
description.russian: Вы одержали победу в чужом овиуме с первого раза

description.english: You made an agreement with the Shadow of another’s ovium
description.russian: Вы договорились с Тенью чужого овиума

description.english: You went up against the Shadow of another’s ovium
description.russian: Вы столкнулись с Тенью чужого овиума

description.english: You unlocked all the achievements of Chapter II
description.russian: Вы получили все достижения второй главы

description.english: I cannot believe that it actually worked...
description.russian: Поверить не могу, что это сработало...

description.english: Hit four targets in a row during the first shooting practice
description.russian: Сбить четыре цели подряд во время первой стрелковой тренировки

description.english: Forgive and forget
Choose the lesser evil
Choose a certain success
See, handsome, I’m not such a bad guy
description.russian: Видишь, я не такой уж плохой парень, красавчик

description.english: Don’t hide your feelings
Demonstrate the shooting skills you acquired
She didn’t deserve this...
No one asked you to be a hero
description.russian: Никто не просил тебя быть героем

description.english: Not today!
You unlocked all the achievements of the first story line of Chapter III
description.russian: Соберите все достижения первой сюжетной арки третьей главы

description.english: Make an unusual friend
What does this Hindu think he’s doing?
Welcome Charlie’s specific proposal
Surrender to love
This is what’s called “collateral damage”
Pull the wool over the annoying constable’s eyes
Admit your feelings.
Step back at the last moment
You unlocked all the achievements of the second story line of Chapter III
description.russian: Соберите все достижения второй сюжетной арки третьей главы

description.english: You unlocked all the achievements of both story lines of Chapter III
description.russian: Соберите все достижения обеих сюжетных арок третьей главы

description.english: Not even death can stop me
description.russian: Даже Смерть не сможет меня остановить

description.english: Gain the trust of the Lord of War
Gain the trust of the Lord of Festivities
Gain the trust of the Lord of Hatred
You don’t need handouts from demons. You are perfectly capable of doing it yourself. Ain’t that right?
description.russian: Вам не нужны подачки от демонов. Вы и сами прекрасно справитесь. Ведь правда?

description.english: The dungeons of Scotland Yard are not a hindrance for paladin

displayName.english: That our life is a game!

description.english: Convince Charlie to help you
Convince Cailin to help you
Save Jennifer from the cruelty of her father
description.russian: Спасите Дженнифер от жестокости ее отца

description.english: Make no mistake while playing with Charlie
description.russian: Ни разу не ошибитесь при игре с Чарли

description.english: What else did you expect?
We have been though a lot together. I don’t want us to part our ways.
description.russian: Мы много прошли вместе. И я не хочу, чтобы наши пути разминулись.

description.english: Make no mistake while patrolling London
description.russian: Ни разу не ошибитесь во время патрулирования Лондона.

description.english: Nothing personal, only business…
Keep your eyes wide open for they are among us…
description.russian: Держите глаза широко открытыми, ибо они среди нас...

description.english: The game is chased. Left to finish it off
Join the winning team
Make the last sacrifice
One mistake can cost you everything…

displayName.english: Walking the road of the shadow of death

description.english: You unlocked all the achievements of Chapter IV
Gather all your allies for the last ritual
description.russian: Соберите всех своих союзников для проведения последнего ритуала

description.english: You prepared second elixir without making any mistakes
description.russian: Вы приготовили второй эликсир, ни разу не ошибившись

description.english: Make a difficult decision
Make not very difficult, but pleasant decision
description.russian: Примите не слишком сложное, но более чем приятное решение

description.english: The crown! The crown for the King!
I thought there would be more blood...
Knock some sense into his head
So many books!
She is innocent!
She deserved it...
Most importantly, keep your hands to yourself
They got in the way
Open the first gate
Open the second gate
Solve the stairway problem
And there were seven of them
description.russian: И было их семеро, и каждый нёс весть…

description.english: I forgive you...
At last it will all end
You know what I'm here for
You unlocked all the achievements of Chapter V
You unlocked all the achievements in the game
